articles.description: This clinic starts on Monday Jan. 4 and is currently only for people in the state’s Phase 1a and is by appointment only. No one can just show up.
articles.content:
MECKLENBURG COUNTY, N.C. (WBTV) - Mecklenburg County health leaders are encouraging everyone over age 75 to get the COVID-19 vaccination as soon as it becomes available.
